price: Ṣé ẹni tí ó (ṣiṣẹ́) tọ ìyọ́nú Allāhu dà bí ẹni tí ó padà wálé pẹ̀lú ìbínú láti ọ̀dọ̀ Allāhu, ibùgbé rẹ̀ sì ni iná Jahanamọ? Ìkángun náà sì burú.
arabic: أَفَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ رِضۡوَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ كَمَنۢ بَآءَ بِسَخَطٖ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: afamani ittabaʿa riḍ'wāna al-lahi kaman bāa bisakhaṭin mina al-lahi wamawāhu jahannamu wabi'sa al-maṣīru
